docs.title: Hello World
docs.text:
Welcome to the PKI Wiki!

This is a simple Hello World site built with MkDocs and the Material theme.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
This documentation site is built using:

  • MkDocs - A fast, simple static site generator
  • Material for MkDocs - A beautiful and feature-rich theme

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
The Material theme provides:

  • Modern, responsive design
  • Search functionality
  • Code syntax highlighting
  • Dark/light mode support
  • And much more!

Built with ❤️ using MkDocs Material
